item.description:
Hi! Everyone, Join Ginny and her friends at the Bar in Strippers in Salisbury to watch the game on Sunday..

Stripers is in a great location on Route 1 in Salisbury right before you go over the Bridge into Newburyport.

While your watching the game don't miss their Award Winning Salad bar that accompanies all entrees.

At Stripers we don't believe you should pay extra for something that has always come with your meal.  Who changed that rule? We never got that memo!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Ginny & and her friends near the bar at Stripers.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Superbowl Sunday at Stripers Grill
